about:
We are a software solution provider with our own innovative product line. We are headquartered in Bangalore, India. Our development centre is also based out of Bangalore. We have software products which are generic as well as specific in nature. All our products are aimed at bringing in productivity and increase profitability to our customers with its usage.

We have been known for not only developing innovative solutions but also implementing this well across a varied customer base. Successful usage of our solutions means our customers have derived the ROI on their software investment.

We are an ADN partner with Autodesk since the last 15 yearsand develop customized applications on Autodesk technology.

We also have a projects division through which we continue to develop customized software to meet specific needs of our customers.
vision: To develop and deliver innovative solutions that increase profitability & productivity, ensuring customer delight.
mission: To be a market leader by effectively implementing our solutions that bring in quick return on investment, deliver exceptional and lasting values and increase operational efficiency for our customers.
